name: EgaRatih - RUAI
description:
Dayak, is an ethnic group that inhabits the heart of Kalimantan. With all its beauty stored millions of uniqueness that is increasingly squeezed by modern civilization.
Today, many ethnic groups in Indonesia have to race against space and time to survive. Many things must be set aside because it is contrary to the culture of 21st century.

This is a portrait of a Dayak woman wearing a traditional hat. Decorated with the feathers of the Ruai bird (Argusianus Argus) which is an endemic animal of Kalimantan as a symbol of beauty. This bird is also a depiction of the agility of the ancestors in protecting their forest.

"RUAI"
2693 x 4039
